author: Chris Wolfgang
name: Wolfgang Console SubCommand
description: A preconfigured SubCommand for use with Wolfgang Preconfigured Console App SubCommand

alternative-name.description: An alternate name for the command. If not specified the command will use the default value based on the class name

response-file.description: Response file support. Command line arguments can be added to a response file and the response can be passed in as though each argument was manually typed at the commandline

choices.displayName: Line separated - Each argument is on a new line.
Space separated - All arguments are on a single line in separated by spaces.
